# storeAnimatedJoints(transforms:jointIndex:)

**Instance Method**

Stores a subset of animated joints.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult func storeAnimatedJoints(transforms: [Transform], jointIndex: Int) -> Bool
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationStateProtocol/storeAnimatedValue(_:)] for more about returning an animation result to the animation system.
